name: mistype
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to write something in a way that is not accurate, using a keyboard: It's not unusual for customers to mistype their email address. People sometimes think they've forgotten a password, when they've actually just mistyped. Some of the letters had been mis-typed. Related word
type verb
More examplesFewer examplesThe problem was human error: a number was mistyped. This part of the code indicates a client error, such as a mistyped URL.If you haven't heard from us, check you didn't mis-type your email address when you signed up.You may have mis-typed the address or followed an outdated link.
